rules_text:
Whenever you teach another creature you control an ability, you may also teach Nira that ability. Do this only once each turn.
Creatures can't attack you and/or permanents you protect unless their controller pays {X} for each creature they control that's attacking you or a permanent you protect, where X is the number of different kinds of counters on Nira. [i](Players protect permanents that can be attacked.)[/i]
